The conversion result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別只會將轉換從。The class only converts from . 嘗試取得結果時會運用各種技術。Various techniques are employed in an attempt to obtain a result. `typeDescriptorContext` 已針對各種服務，包括， ，和。`typeDescriptorContext` is checked for various services including , , and . 提供的字串也會根據內部清單 WPF 註冊路由事件檢查。The provided string is also checked against the internal list of WPF registered routed events on . 如果無法解決，請在所有這些嘗試就會擲回。If all these attempts fail to resolve, is thrown.

span.span: is not a string or cannot be converted.
